      • addProductToOrder

        public void addProductToOrder​(int ordID,
                              int prodID,
                              int q)
                       throws InsufficientStockException
        Add a product to a current order.
        Parameters:
        ordID - The id of a current Order which the product will be added.
        prodID - The id of the product that we want to add to the order.
        q - Quantity of product to add to the order.
        Throws:
        InsufficientStockException - If the quantity to remove is bigger than the quantity which is stock in the order.

      • removeProductFromOrder

        public void removeProductFromOrder​(int ordID,
                                   int prodID,
                                   int q)
                            throws InsufficientStockException,
                                   ProductNotContainedInOrderException
        Delete a quantity of product from an order.
        Parameters:
        ordID - The id of a current Order which the product will be remove.
        prodID - The id of the product that we want to remove to the order.
        q - Quantity of product to remove to the order.
        Throws:
        InsufficientStockException - If the quantity to remove is bigger than the quantity which is stock in the order.
        ProductNotContainedInOrderException - If the product isn't in the basket.

      • closeOrder

        public void closeOrder​(int ordID)
                throws UnreachableStatusException
        Change the order status to finished.
        Parameters:
        ordID - ID of the order to which we want to change the status.
        Throws:
        UnreachableStatusException - If the conditions to set the PAYED status aren't met.
